abstract: Accepting the Mark Twain Prize for comedy, Will Ferrell promptly dropped it. But he promised to take really good care of it.
snippet: Accepting the Mark Twain Prize for comedy, Will Ferrell promptly dropped it. But he promised to take really good care of it.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Kennedy, John F, Center for the Performing Arts

lead_paragraph: To hear Will Ferrell tell it, accepting the 14th Mark Twain Prize for American Humor was a matter of relenting.

headline.main: Oops, There Goes the Twain Award
